sections:
# Vision
TUfast is the #1 productivity tool for students at TU Dresden. For two years now we are developing together with you and the FSRs the perfect product for your everyday student life. 
We are aiming at 5000 Users at TU Dresden and releasing the tool for one more school in saxony.

# Functions
TUfast provides the following functionality: auto-login in online-platforms of TU Dresden, quick-accesses and hotkeys, overview on all OPAL-courses as well as improvements for OPAL itself. Find out more after installing TUfast!

# Project information
TUfast was released at 05.2020, is [open-source](https://github.com/TUfast-TUD/TUfast_TUD) and developed by students. As of 01.01.2022 TUfast has about 2500 Users on all plattforms. A project roadmap can be found in GitHub.

The project is supported by
\- Frau Jantos (eLearning-Koordinatorin) / Herr Jantos (SELMA-PM)
\- The following FSRs:
***

# Is TUfast secure?
ToDo: ÃœberprÃ¼fung Informationssicherheit

# Privacy notice
TUfast saves user data only locally on your PC. If TUfast is uninstalled all data will be deleted. It will stay like that forever! Here you can find the full privacy notice for TUfast: [privacy notice](/datenschutz).
